Views¶

Views to handle all requests for survey app.

surveys.views.open_survey_form(request, survey_uid, phase_id=None)¶

View to open a survey form. If survey is simple, default phase is opened else phase_id is used.

Type: GET

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

surveys.views.submit_survey_response(*args, **kwargs)¶

View to submit a response for survey phase. This view receives response submitted by the user and is queued for processing.

Type: POST

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
